DOC.brief_summary: Purpose propose research determine impact probiotic yogurt supplement Lactobacillus rhamnosus ( Fiti ) compare regular yogurt well-being woman live HIV .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Probiotic Bacteria Efficacy Anti-retroviral Therapy Recurrence Bacterial Vaginosis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Confirmed HIV infection ; Being treat antiretroviral medication > 6 month . Exclusion criterion : Pregnancy ; Hypersensitive ferment milk ; Intolerant lactose ; Complaints bacterial vaginosis require treatment
